# [Interview #1164: Random Undated Personalizations, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1164#1)

#### Aethenoth

Can an allomantic bronze burner hear the rhythms on Roshar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, this is possible.
